query:
ALTER TABLE dojo_settings 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stripeApiKey VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stripePublishableKey VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stripeWebhookSecret VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS squareAccessToken VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS squareLocationId VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentProcessor VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'stripe',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentApiKey VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentMerchantId VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentSetupLater INT DEFAULT 0;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stripePublishableKey VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stripeWebhookSecret VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS squareAccessToken VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS squareLocationId VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentProcessor VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'stripe',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentApiKey VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentMerchantId VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentSetupLater INT DEFAULT 0;
